::Killfest::

Killfest's eyes widen. "To the Ark? There are an estimated nine bots 
aboard, that we'd have to fight with only four."

He smiles, stepping forward. "Although I wouldn't mind some battle. 
Me and EndBringer will accompany you in this attack. Demise and 
Greven will follow behind on another shuttle, as will any other bots 
that come."

He knew EndBringer's power in close quarters and valued it. He also 
knew that Demise and Greven would also help make a difference, and he 
wanted them there.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> OOC: Robert Dahl again.
> 
> "Astroblast will shuttle us there now. He can carry me, and two 
> others to come along." He finished, like he was in a hurry.
